about_the_game:
A VISUAL JOURNEY ABOUT LOVE AND SCIENCE

Follow Eve through her journey to discover the truth behind her world.
Solve Puzzles, do science and meet robots !

The Lithium moon incident is a 2D side scrolling game that will transport you inside a different world.
A world where robots and people shares the same streets and the same feelings.

WHAT HAPPENED TO GAL ?
Piece after piece, complete the puzzle in order to find out where is Gal, then, solve the mystery.

COMPLETE THE LITHIUM MOON
Gal the scientist left some clues, will you be able to put the thing together and complete his masterpiece ?

ROBOTS ARE PEOPLE
ROBOTS ARE PEOPLE, STOP SAYING THE OPPOSITEEEE !!!!!!!!!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains references to: Drugs, Suicide and other things not suitable for every audience.
